title: AgroGloryTime
author: AgroGloryTime
created_time: July 18, 2022, 10:16:34 PMLast edit: August 08, 2022, 01:10:40 AM by AgroGloryTime
content: Dear Community! Welcome to the AgroGloryTime board!We are a Ukrainian-based agriculture company, aimed at changing the landscape of investment attraction and the principles the synergy between the company and investors lies on.Getting weary of unfair terms offered by banks, we've looked for a proper solution in the blockchain field. Here's how the idea of $AGTI, the AgroGloryTime DAO's native asset, first appeared. Simplicity is genius - $AGTI allows our business to attract direct private investments, avoiding the loss caused by the high interest rates. The investors, in turn, access the asset with a guaranteed yearly interest of over 25% APR, which is binged to the shares of a currently operating business, regulated by the governmental watchdog.August 2022 is marked by the long-awaited $AGTI blockchain release.  The company is running a presale campaign with CEX and DEX listings planned in the mid-term. For more info, check out our website & follow AgroGloryTime on social media. AgroGloryTime Media HighlightsCoinspeaker: AgroGloryTime DAO and Interest-earning Token, $AGTI // Press releaseBitcoinist: CEO InterviewTechBullion: Tokenizing Real Business with Property-backed Assets: AgroGloryTime Case StudyInvesting.com: CEO InterviewYour questions are warmly welcomed in the thread below!

comments.body: Interesting. I didn't expect the CEO of agricultural company would be a girl

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Some updates for today, team! 1) Check out our tokenization model explained here2) We warmly welcomed you to follow us on Twitter! We share the news from our fields daily there!

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: For those asking, the current $AGTI token price is $0.03, with the entry barrier of $1000. The team is completing the blockchain testing. Since it's launched in August, the price will move up a little, but the minimum investment will be lower!Thanks for staying with us! More big updates are coming soon!

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Dear Community! For those new to this thread, we are glad to announce our Twitter bounty campaign is still on air! No promo required, we are just interested in as many guys as possible learning more about our philosophy.So you are warmly welcomed to share your fair opinion on the AgroGloryTime project on your social media. All you need is:1. Share your thoughts on #AgroGloryTime2. Tag @agroglorytime3. DM us a link to your post4. Take home your $AGTI tokensFair and easy! We will reward all the meaningful reviews!

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: 5 000 000 $AGTI Tokens Already Sold During the Pre-sale Stage! We are glad to announce we've already sold over 5 million $AGTI tokens. We are thankful to our clients, both from Ukraine & worldwide.Let's keep growing together!#AgroGloryTime #agriculture #farming #investment

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Tokenomics & Financial Model Updates Dear Community! Last week we've shared #AgroGloryTime case-study displaying how our tokenization model works for early investors. The full article is available HERE.All thoughts and opinions are welcomed in this thread! Let's discuss!

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: AgroGloryTime on July 29, 2022, 09:13:00 AMTokenomics & Financial Model Updates Dear Community! Last week we've shared #AgroGloryTime case-study displaying how our tokenization model works for early investors. The full article is available HERE.All thoughts and opinions are welcomed in this thread! Let's discuss!Based on the above article, you are assuring that in about 2 years, your method will be widely used.Why do you think you can say you have high regards that this platform will attain good adoption?What are the things that you think your advantage in this competitive market and attain success in about couple of years?

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.created_time: August 07, 2022, 12:51:45 PMLast edit: August 08, 2022, 11:35:50 PM by AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Quote from: TimeTeller on July 29, 2022, 10:57:43 PMQuote from: AgroGloryTime on July 29, 2022, 09:13:00 AMTokenomics & Financial Model Updates Dear Community! Last week we've shared #AgroGloryTime case-study displaying how our tokenization model works for early investors. The full article is available HERE.All thoughts and opinions are welcomed in this thread! Let's discuss!Based on the above article, you are assuring that in about 2 years, your method will be widely used.Why do you think you can say you have high regards that this platform will attain good adoption?What are the things that you think your advantage in this competitive market and attain success in about couple of years?Thanks for your question! There are several reasons we consider $AGTI and our tokenization platform to be a thing both for the company and investors. First, AgroGloryTime is an already profitable offline company, valued above $50 million. So it already brings profit, as well as has polished all processes related to raising crops and distributing them to the market. Therefore, the success of the tokensale won't affect the existing state of things. The company raises money with $AGTI not to become a business (as it's already on air), but to force its growth. Hence, even the lack of investors in the early stage won't hit the company, its plans, as well as its capability to comply with its obligations.Secondly, the model we offer is really attractive, although it might look a bit uncommon for today's market. Our investors earn both from the token price increase, and the profit from our online business, which is shared quarterly in stablecoins. Last year AgroGloryTime raised over 1,000 tons of vegetables, while the company constantly increases its productivity. And the potential here is almost limitless, as it now manages almost 5k acres of highly fertile land in a promising location. You can explore more HERE.  Last, but not least, we are building a truly fair and transparent business. AgroGloryTime is a white company, regulated by Ukranian watchdogs. Also, we make a big stress on consistent direct communication. For instance, you can find our owners answering questions in Ukrainian chat, so you can get your Qs answered firsthand. We will help you with translation there:)So, these are just a few points. Again, we are not in a hurry, and we are not too dependent on the fundraising campaign success. Whether it will go faster or slower, we and our early investors are backed with real already working business, which won't be cancelled or disappear, like many crypto startups.Thanks again for asking! Feel free to explore our company on social media!

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: New week - new batch of news! 1. The $AGTI token release date is set for August 15.2. Daria Novhorodkina, CEO of AgroGloryTime, has appeared on Investing.com, thanks to the interview with the CoinQuora team.3. Pre-sale price updates. We expect a price of $0,05 since the token is released in a week, so you can still hop on a leaving train at just $0,03!

comments.author: nira09
comments.body: Is the information about the project team, White paper and some other detailed information not shown yet?Besides, are you really going to create your own Blockchain network and it will be released this month?

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Quote from: nira09 on August 07, 2022, 01:12:13 PMIs the information about the project team, White paper and some other detailed information not shown yet?Besides, are you really going to create your own Blockchain network and it will be released this month?Thanks for your interest, and - yep - we have all the company details shared on our website, including details on our physical location, entity and so on. You could start your journey from HERE We are releasing the $AGTI contract in a week, that's right. Currently, we are running a pre-sale campaign, so early adopters are warmly welcomed. As for the network - we've decided to base it on the BSC chain. More information on $AGTI is available HERE.

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Dear Community! We are glad to share the latest interview with our amazing CEO, Daria. This time she explained how our tokenization model turns into a win-win solution both for the company and its investors, how we plan to earn and many other interesting details. Check out the article on CoinQuoraShare your thoughts and follow us on social media!

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: After the disaster in the space, How are we sure we can convince investors to buy into token that the value rely on other coin?

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Quote from: royalfestus on August 08, 2022, 10:58:12 PMAfter the disaster in the space, How are we sure we can convince investors to buy into token that the value rely on other coin?Thank you for your question! Great, we are thinking the same way. Here's why the $AGTI value is not binged to any other token's performance, but backed with the revenue of a $50 million registered Ukrainian company. Last year, AgroGloryTime harvested a crop exceeding 1,000 tonnes. This year we've already surpassed this level. Do the math - what is the ongoing trend for the next few years regarding the food market? This is where $AGTI value comes from. Would be glad to keep in touch with you on any of our social media, where you can find the latest news from our fields!

Keep growing together, team! 🌱Check out NewsBTC article for more Details

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Dear Community,This week is filled with significant updates for AgroGloryTime and our investors. Probably, you've already checked our updated website or even purchased another bunch of $AGTI via our brand new interface.If not, let's go through all the latest news step by step! Updated WebsiteWe couldn't be more glad to present our completely new website - the fresh face of AgroGloryTime company! Considering the growing interest in our entity and its token, $AGTI, we had nothing to do but become even better for you. You are welcome to go see yourself! $AGTI Contract ReleaseAnother amazing update to share with you is related to the heart of our tokenization model - the $AGTI token. From now on, our BSC-based contract is available, so we are one step closer to the open market. This means you can now submit your MetaMask wallet to keep a close eye on your growing in price allocation or purchase some more tokens with ease within our new friendly UX! $AGTI Price UpdateJoin us celebrating the great updates mentioned above with a discounted $AGTI price! This August we are keeping a price as low as $0,05, so you could join our project at pleasurable conditions. The pre-sale price goes up with every following token drop, so congratulations - you are just on time. And last but not least - don't forget that $AGTI is an asset backed with real business, accessing you to your part of AgroGloryTime real profit, paid quarterly in stablecoins. Thanks for your support & keep growing together!

comments.author: AgroGloryTime
comments.body: Quote from: nira09 on August 12, 2022, 04:14:40 PMQuote from: AgroGloryTime on August 07, 2022, 07:32:54 PMQuote from: nira09 on August 07, 2022, 01:12:13 PMIs the information about the project team, White paper and some other detailed information not shown yet?Besides, are you really going to create your own Blockchain network and it will be released this month?Thanks for your interest, and - yep - we have all the company details shared on our website, including details on our physical location, entity and so on. You could start your journey from HERE We are releasing the $AGTI contract in a week, that's right. Currently, we are running a pre-sale campaign, so early adopters are warmly welcomed. As for the network - we've decided to base it on the BSC chain. More information on $AGTI is available HERE. Thanks for responding so well, I'll check it out soon. Glad to hear that 5,000,000 AGTI tokens have been sold. Have sales met Softcap or are they still far from the desired target?Hey nira09, thanks for your question! As far as $AGTI is quite an untypical utility token, we do not publicly announce the soft and hard cap. This is because our main offline product - the AgroGloryTime company and its agriculture businesses are already operating. So, although we run a pre-sale, the product itself already works, as well as the token functionality. The USP of $AGTI token is its share from our real business profits, so we don't wait here until the campaign reaches any certain level. Every adopter is already accessed to the quarterly paid APR, no matter how early they came.
